mapper.sql: fundsId, fundsName, fundsPrice, fundsDesc, fundsPhone, fundsImgs, fundsImg1, fundsImg2, fundsImg3, fundsImg4, fundsUser, kenya_admin.adminId, FundAdvantage,adminUser
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from kenya_funds left join kenya_admin on kenya_funds.adminId=kenya_admin.adminId
order by ${orderByClause}
